name: Design III
description: Students develop the skills necessary to create real-world art and design-related projects. Students create full or partial design mockups, work in teams, and submit proposals to design competitions within or outside the school. Students explore contemporary art and design via simulated workplace assignments, visual presentation, field trips, guest critics, discussion and critique. [144P]
prerequisites: FAS246H5, 1.5 credits in FAH/VCC and P.I.
